programme.title: Istidraj

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 50
programme.desc: (Encore) Guest host John Legend ("The Voice") and Lena Waithe ("Queen & Slim").

programme.title: Last Vegas
programme.desc: Four friends take a break from their day-to-day lives to throw a bachelor party in Las Vegas for their last remaining single pal.

programme.title: Elton John: The Nation's Favourite Song
programme.desc: This 90 minute special tells the story behind the 20 greatest songs ever recorded by Elton John. Mixing rich archive footage and home videos with new interviews, the documentary paints a picture of the man behind the music, telling the story of how these timeless songs came about and what impact they had on the world.

programme.title: All Over The Workplace - EP 8
programme.desc: All Over The Workplace offers children a unique opportunity to explore what it is really like to do the jobs they dream about when they get older. In each episode, two children get to do just that, meeting various celebrities and well-known role models along the way. They even manage to try doing the job for real, often with funny and mind-boggling outcomes!

programme.title: Rusty Knight - EP 7
programme.desc: In Scrapland, the characters have all been put together from various recycled household utensils. They devote their unique talents to getting ex-cash register Knight Rusty out of trouble, who thinks he's the bravest, coolest knight in all of Scrapland (but he's really a show-off with a big mouth).

programme.title: Ponteng School
programme.desc: A charming story about how WISELY, a 12 year boy who decides to skip school because he wants to avoid his school bullies, ends up wondering around Singapore, helping others to discover more about themselves.It is an adventure, a comedy, a family drama.

programme.title: Sarah & Duck S3 - EP 33
programme.desc: Sarah and her loud, quacky friend Duck are back for a whole new series of fun and heartfelt adventures as they explore the world around them in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Backyardigans - EP 66
programme.desc: The show's 5 high-spirited preschool friends - Pablo, Uniqua, Tasha, Tyrone and Austin rely on their vivid imaginations to transform their backyard into a fantastical adventure and together they embark on amazing journeys.

programme.title: Coconut The Little Dragon S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: Fire Dragon Coconut, Gourmet Dragon Oscar and porcupine Matilda are always up for adventure! Life is not always easy on Dragon Island - Coconut has flying problems, Oscar is the only vegetarian in his family and Matilda has no say as a porcupine on Dragon Island anyway. Nevertheless the little ones prove that sometimes the smallest can be the biggest!

programme.title: Counting With Paula S4 - EP 13
programme.desc: Billy is not keen on taking part in some of the carnival games the other children want to play. Will the children still be able to have a fun together at the beach carnival? The children and Mr Explorer have to pass a series of dance tests before they can enter the Jungle Music Festival. Will all of them make it through?

programme.title: Paw Patrol S5 - EP 13
programme.desc: Get ready for a tail-wagging good time in these rescue adventures with the PAW Patrol! No job is too big, no pup is too small as Ryder and the pups are always ready to lend a paw.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S3 - EP 20
programme.desc: A monster truck and his human driver go on adventures together while learning about science, technology, engineering and maths.

programme.title: Shimmer And Shine S3 - EP 5
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twin genies, Shimmer and Shine unintentionally create chaos in their attempts to grant wishes for their human best friend, Leah.

programme.title: Good Chef Bad Chef S9 - EP 5
programme.desc: Today's consumer is constantly being bombarded with conflicting messages. Good Chef Bad Chef pits very different cooking styles and philosophies against each other. There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.title: Stars In Style S5 - EP 2

programme.title: Earth's Great Seasons - EP 4

Summer is a time of long days and glorious abundance. But the living isn't always easy when the temperatures rise. Autumn brings the world's most spectacular transformations. It's also the last chance to breed, to grow up, to stock up before the cold returns. During winter - the most magical, dramatic season of all - animals find inventive ways to survive.

programme.title: Attenborough And The Giant Dinosaur
programme.desc: David Attenborough tells the story of the discovery and reconstruction in Argentina of the world's largest-known dinosaur, a brand new species of titanosaur. Measuring 37m long - close to four London buses put end to end - and weighing 70 metric tons, it now holds the record as the biggest animal ever to walk the earth. Filmed over the next two years, the documentary follows the twists and turns of this forensic investigation.

(重)随着我国快速成为智慧国，欢喜街的大大小小都紧跟时代步伐，不断自我提升。这个星期，欢喜街的街坊到外头上课，很是热闹。说到热闹，久违的香港艺人陈启泰也拉队来到香港的一个乐龄活动中心，听说他在这里找到一位68岁的大姐，能舞狮头，又会唱越剧！.

programme.title: 愿者上钩 CyberPunk'D - EP 2
programme.desc: The "Internet of things" has empowered us, and even enriched our lives. But it's also made us more vulnerable to hacks. Comedian Fakkah Fuzz discovers how to get smart when using smart devices. 法卡法兹的网络安全之旅已经展开。密码、加密，甚至是网络钓鱼，这些名词对他不再陌生。不过，这样就可以保障在网络上的安全吗？ 你知不知道，勒索软件是存在的！温度调节器可以被用来进行要挟。除非你把赎金交给勒索者，否则你根本开不了冷气或暖气。 会说话、进行互动的娃娃，也可以因为蓝牙连接没有加密，而让心术不正的人，通过麦克风和孩子说话。 互联网上的世界似乎危机四伏，听起来是不是很恐怖！ 其实一点也不！只要勇于面对，加强对互联网的认识，就能尽本分做好防守员，因为在这个互联网的世界里，只有《愿者上钩》。.

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 38

(PG)(双声道-中/韩)佳英顺利产下男婴，取名韩尹秀。五年过去了，但大家仍然没有正韩的音讯。世娜在公司已经跟贤基平起平坐了，并被安排策划大规模商场 – YB城市。有人在网上大肆散播YB城市不可能成功的文章，令世娜怀疑正韩在背后搞鬼。.

programme.title: 歌手2018 Singer 2018 - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) This series features a modification to the Challenge rounds, with the Challenger entering the competition starting at the knockout rounds instead of Challenge round (where a new substitute singer would enter the competition instead). Challengers must avoid last place on their first week in addition to finishing in top four on the second week (in a combination of both knockout and challenge rounds) to be declared safe; failing either challenge instantly eliminates the singer from the competition. (重)《歌手2018》与往季竞演结束后统一投票的操作方式有所不同，本季光临现场的大众听审们有两次机会行使投票权力，而新增的这一次机会是“预投票”环节。“预投票”环节，是指500位大众听审在前四位出场歌手中选择一名进行一轮“预投票”。该节目的首发歌手为汪峰、Jessie J、李圣杰、张韶涵、GAI、张天、李晓东；补位歌手为李泉、华晨宇、腾格尔、郁可唯；踢馆歌手为苏诗丁、KZ·谭定安、霍尊，由张韶涵担任该节目的首位女性音乐串讲人。.

programme.title: 30分钟煮一餐 Quick Cuisine - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Career is still pretty much a dominant part of Singaporeans' lives. As such, most Singaporeans resort to eating out rather than going home to enjoy a sumptuous home-cooked meal. Working mothers always aspire to let their children and family enjoy a nutritious home-cooked meal. Hence, Quick Cuisine offers to inform all on how to prepare a meal in 30 minutes or less. (重)人们经常在外用餐，其实心里都非常渴望吃家常菜，尤其是忙碌的职业妇女虽然有女佣代劳，难得下厨，不过她们其实也很希望在特别的日子里，为家人和孩子准备美食。因此，为忙碌的专业和工作人士提供容易处理而且又营养丰富的食谱和烹饪秘诀，将会广受欢迎。.

programme.title: 地球的孤儿 Orphans Of The Earth - EP 3

programme.title: 进击的台湾 Hello Taiwan - EP 1

Yalan apologises to Wu Chun and wants her to return to their family, but Wu Chun refuses to do so. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)吴春拆穿雅兰其实早就知道她是波兰，但因为知道真相后更加讨厌她，所以才没说出真相。雅兰无可否认，向吴春道歉，要她回家，两人好好相处。吴春不接雅兰的建议，结果被雅兰嘲讽一番。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 44

programme.title: 医生们 Doctors - EP 15

He declares war with Douzhi in fury and vows to deal with Zhihong. Douzhi faints from the provocation after hearing of it. Zhihong tries to rescue him but in vain... (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)圣钟发现斗植并没有交出儿子明勋全部的秘密资金细节后，生气地冲到斗植的病房向他宣战，并宣称会对智弘下手。斗植又气又急，因脑栓塞晕倒，智弘拚尽全力地抢救也无能为力。。。。。。.

programme.title: 医生们 Doctors - EP 16

When Zhihong and Huijing run into Renzhu and Bolan, Zhihong reveals that he and Huijing are dating. Renzhu says she will keep the secret for them. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)由于斗植的去世，圣钟如愿以偿地就任了理事长，儿子明勋成了院长。智弘和慧静在食堂吃饭时，碰上了仁珠和波澜，智弘干脆向他们公开了和慧静的恋爱关系。仁珠说会为他俩守住秘密。.

programme.title: 极件任务 Mission Delivery - EP 5

Huang Jinglun takes a trip there to learn how to pick the dream koi and to accomplish his mission in escorting them back to Singapore safely. (重)锦鲤在日本被誉为水中的活宝石。每年10月是日本锦鲤收成季节，全世界的买家都飞往新潟县小千古市购买锦鲤。特派员黄靖伦也接受委托，到锦鲤之乡协助锦鲤运输，此外还要下泥池协助锦鲤收成和学习如何挑选名贵锦鲤。他能否完成任务？.

programme.title: 搜密新加坡 Secret Singapore Sr 2 - EP 7
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and English) Secret Singapore is an investigative-style travelogue, where our roving detective-host digs for clues, and snoops for hush-hush places and people here. Our host will go knee-deep in mud, track through jungles, creep through barbed wire fences, just to give you that exclusive access. (重)(双声道-中/英)搜密新加坡第二系列节目带你穿街走巷寻访被遗忘的历史、私密的隐匿处、有趣的人物和另类工作，给你满满的惊喜！追随主持人的脚步踏上任务之旅，一起破解谜团、搜寻不为人知的地点、走访有趣故事的人物及探索本地让人咋舌的事项。.

programme.title: 生活达人 Life's Perfectionists S10 - EP 5

programme.title: 我的打拚日记 Workman Diaries - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Most of the post-90 generation graduates are caught in jobs with long working hours and low pay. But for one brave soul, she chooses to exit and follow her heart. Beijing is home to many migrant worker families and for some, affordable child care means relying on willing and tired grandparents. And for some of the elderly migrant workers, after enduring many years of loneliness and hardship to support their family, they're faced with imminent retrenchment. (重)90后大学毕业生受不了电商工作加班无休，毅然裸辞去追梦。北漂夫妻在北京养育幼儿， 昂贵的生活负担迫使双方家长倾力协助。在北京15年孤苦的日子，年近七旬的清洁工，只望儿子顺利大学毕业。看北漂人为成就北京梦而奔走。.

programme.title: 医生们 Doctors - EP 18

(PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)重大受不了实习医生庆俊的百般刁难，躲到顺熙店里干活疗伤，不想回医院工作了。顺熙看他可怜，便带他回家里让他休息一晚。不料，这晚智弘也来家里了，重大怕被他发现，顺熙只好让他躲在她房间里。.

programme.title: Di Hujung Pelangi - EP 7
programme.desc: Host: Norfasarie'Di Hujung Pelangi' takes a look at the inspirational journeys of these special families who have learn to accept and embrace life's challenges by moving their lives forward in the most positive direction. Cerebral palsy (CP) is a condition caused by injury to the parts of the brain that control our ability to use our muscles and bodies. Cerebral means having to do with the brain. Palsy means weakness or problems with using the muscles. Often the injury happens before birth, sometimes during delivery, or, soon after being born.Sometimes children with CP can also have learning problems, problems with hearing or seeing (called sensory problems), or intellectual disabilities. This episode will recount a family's early days of dealing with their child cerebral palsy. We will also feature Kashif and Hashimah Hamidon- the people behind the I Am Speciable movement to find out the objectives behind this movement and their journey with Cerebral Palsy.

programme.desc: Vasantham Cafe gets re-opened after 8 years by Bukit Batok Baby & Potong Pasir Papa! A loving married couple visits the Caf only to be carried away by the hilarious commotion that occurs there! And get ready to be mesmerized by several exciting performances by our Vasantham Celebrities and an amazing Ilaiyaraaja mash-up by R.V Ganesan & Kalai Vaani!

programme.title: Ha Ha Ha Sirippu 2018 - EP 2
programme.desc: Laugh out loud to comedy scenes from Kollywood films, right here on Vasantham!

programme.title: Veera Pandiya Katta Bhooman
programme.desc: Veerapandiya Kattabomman, the king of Panchalankurichi, discovers that the British are trying to create unrest in his domain. His battle against the British forms the crux of the story.

programme.title: Yeh Jawani Hai Deewani
programme.desc: Kabir, a guy who wants to make it big in the travel industry, meets Naina during a trekking trip. She falls for him but refrains from expressing it. Years later they meet at a friend's wedding.

programme.title: Going Underground
programme.desc: Deep beneath the bustling streets of Singapore lies a subterranean world that few have seen or heard of before.

programme.title: Ha Ha Ha Sirippu 2018 - EP 5
programme.desc: Laugh out loud to comedy scenes from Kollywood films, right here on Vasantham!

programme.title: Tamil Seithi - EP 11
programme.desc: Tamil Daily News.

programme.title: Queen - EP 2
programme.desc: The first season of Queen, comprising 11 episodes, chronicles the life of Shakthi Seshadri from the age of 14 to 40. In the process, she becomes the state topper in school, a celebrated actress and one of the most sought-after politicians in the state.

programme.title: Darbar
programme.desc: A police officer on a chase to hunt down a dreaded gangster for fulfilling his own secret agenda.Starring: Rajinikanth, Nayanthara, Nivetha Thomas, and Sunil Shetty.

programme.desc: Tamil Daily News.

programme.title: Vanakkam Singai - EP 15
programme.desc: "Vanakkam Singai" - is an amalgamation of indoor and outdoor segments within one programme to cater to general audience of multiple age groups. Making the transition from radio's weekday morning belt to television, "Vanakkam Singai" is a 1-hour Breakfast show that aims to kick start Sundays morning with a smile. The segments will comprise of quick breakfast demonstrations , lifestyle & wellness, light-hearted discussion topics that all households can relate to.

programme.title: Sachien
programme.desc: A love battle on a college campus between two young students, Sachein and Shalini who try to deny their feelings for each other.

programme.title: Sita
programme.desc: A young man who grew up in a monastery and a tough businesswoman with questionable morals establish a unique relationship.

programme.desc: Sophy Ridge analyses the interviews from her show and looks at the reaction of politicians to what her guests had to say.

programme.title: Billabong Pipe Masters
programme.desc: Be a fly on the wall at the Volcom House during Billabong Pipe Masters 2019 in Oahu, Hawaii. Be a fly on the wall at the Billabong Pipe Masters 2019 – get inside the action to hear the conversations, see the preparations and share the excitement.

programme.title: Looking for musical chemistry
programme.desc: S1 E1 – Songwriters get randomly paired up with producers as they work together to create an original track. S1 E1 – Songwriters Nic Da Kid, Lily Kiing and Piers James get randomly paired up with producers Melle Brown, TwoSeven and Tokyo the Producer in this round as they work together to create an original track.

programme.title: 4 Waves 1 Hour
programme.sub-title: The Story of Mick Fanning's 2013 ASP Title
programme.desc: A battle between Kelly Slater and Mick Fanning came down to just four waves in two 30-minute heats. The 2013 ASP World Championship was a battle between Kelly Slater and Mick Fanning that all came down to just four waves in two 30-minute heats. Mick's journey to the title is narrated by the man himself in an intimate and dramatic look at his win.

programme.title: Aconcagua: A New Chance
programme.desc: Runner Fernanda Maciel aims to be the first woman to climb up and down a 6,961m mountain in a day. Follow ultra-marathoner Fernanda Maciel as she travels to Argentina and attempts to become the first woman to climb up and down one of the highest mountains on the planet, the Aconcagua, in one day.

programme.title: Fabgirl
programme.desc: Fabgirl left soccer for dance and has been empowered by breaking in so many ways. Fabgirl left soccer for dance and has been empowered by breaking in so many ways. For Fabgirl dancing is like oxygen and she needs it to survive.

programme.title: Renanted
programme.desc: Renanted put his time and energy into the positive outlet of dance and has built a life for himself. Renanted comes from a rough area but chose to put his time and energy into the positive outlet of dance and has built a life for himself popping.

programme.title: Topias 'Topson' Taavitsainen
programme.desc: What does the future hold for Finland's Topias 'Topson' Taavitsainen after successive titles at TI? Two years after joining Team OG from relative obscurity, Finland's Topias 'Topson' Taavitsainen helped lead them to successive titles at The International. But what does the future hold for him?

programme.title: The Legend
programme.desc: Chris Davenport's innovative career and repeated personal reinvention has earned him much-deserved respect. Chris 'Dav' Davenport is a professional skier, an adventurer, and a mountaineer. He has mastered nearly every aspect of the sport, and his biggest adventure yet is trying to ski Mount Everest.

programme.title: Casa Betesda
programme.desc: Eric and John hang out at Casa Betesda Orphanage before flying to Chile to shred buckets of fresh powder. The brothers arrive in Nicaragua, where they find some beautiful surf and hang out at Casa Betesda Orphanage. After helping paint rooms and school the groms with some skate tips, they jump on a flight to Chile to shred some ridiculous snow.

programme.title: End of the Road
programme.desc: After an unexpected disaster befalls both brothers in Chile, the rest of the journey is suddenly in jeopardy. A moment of miscalculation in Chile winds up sending both John and Eric to the hospital and puts the rest of the journey in peril. Ian Walsh stays behind to surf a big swell while he awaits word from the brothers on whether or not they can continue.

programme.title: Bouncing Cats
programme.sub-title: The story of Breakdance Project Uganda
programme.desc: A Ugandan AIDS orphan works to empower his community's children through exposure to B-Boy dance culture. AIDS orphan Abraham 'Abramz' Tekya works to empower, rehabilitate and heal the children of Uganda through his free workshop that teaches young people about hip-hop, B-Bboy culture and breaking.

programme.title: Dubrovnik to Mostar
programme.desc: Explore the countries – and their skate spots – involved in the Yugoslavian war of independence. Brian Delatorre, Cyrus Bennett, Simon Stricker, Alex Davis and Andrew Wilson are on a mission to explore the countries involved in the 1991 Yugoslavian war of independence. A ruined hotel in Dubrovnik is their first skate spot.

programme.title: Sarajevo and Belgrade
programme.desc: Cyrus Bennett, Brian Delatorre, Alex Davis, Andrew Wilson and Vladik Scholz head to Sarajevo and Belgrade. Cyrus Bennett, Brian Delatorre, Alex Davis, Andrew Wilson and Vladik Scholz head to Sarajevo, capital of Bosnia and Herzegovina, and Belgrade, capital of Serbia, on the last two stops of their Balkan tour.

programme.title: La Dura Dura
programme.desc: A legendary sport climber and the young phenom hot on his heels team up to send the world's hardest route. Chris Sharma has been at the top of the sport climbing game for 15 years, but 19-year-old prodigy Adam Ondra is hot on his heels. The legend and the young contender team up in Catalunya, Spain, trying to establish the world's hardest route.

programme.title: Race for The Nose
programme.desc: A rivalry for the speed record up The Nose of El Capitan, California, USA pushes climbers to their limits. For a decade, Hans Florine and Dean Potter have one-upped each other in a wild race for the speed record up The Nose, a 3,000ft route on El Capitan in California, USA, each taking increasingly enormous risks to reclaim the title.

programme.title: Wyandotte’s BMX highlights
programme.desc: Tyler Fernengel gives us a tour of his favourite BMX spots in his hometown of Wyandotte, outside Detroit. Tyler Fernengel gives us a tour of his favourite BMX spots in his hometown of Wyandotte, outside Detroit. From the streets of the Motor City to the indoor Transitions Skatepark, Tyler shreds the spots that made him the BMX star he is today.

programme.title: Welcome to San Diego
programme.desc: After a visit to Salt Lake City, Tyler Fernengel meets his new pro BMX buddies for a session in San Diego. Tyler Fernengel swings through Salt Lake City on his drive west before pushing on to San Diego. When he arrives, he meets up with fellow BMX pros Dennis Enarson and Chad Kerley to see for himself how the sessions really go down in his new town.

programme.title: The Cool Kid
programme.desc: Nintendo and Sega squared off against each other in the '90s, both attempting to corner the video game market. While the race to claim market share between Sega and Nintendo was a tight one, the Sega system had access to an FM synth, which introduced new sound possibilities. With it, Yuzo Koshiro produced the masterful Streets of Rage soundtrack.

programme.title: The Role of Role Play
programme.desc: Japanese role-playing games are responsible for some of the most iconic melodies in video game history. The drama and emotion in Japanese role-playing games have inspired some of the most iconic melodies in video game history. As a result, Nobuo Uematsu’s melodies from Final Fantasy have transcended video games, appearing in orchestral renditions.

programme.title: Traveleyes
programme.desc: Traveleyes pairs sighted and blind travellers to share the adventure of a lifetime. Through organised trips with sighted guides, Traveleyes is helping blind people discover places that were once off limits. Traveleyes pairs sighted and blind travellers to share an adventure together.
